item.title: 升级到SpringBoot3、JDK21
item.description: 迁移指南： Spring-Boot-3.0-Migration-Guide Spring 方面 1. URL 映射更改 Spring MVC and WebFlux URL Matching Changes As of Spring Framework 6.0, the trailing slash matching configuration option has been deprecated and its default value set to false. This means that previously, the following controller would match both “GET /some/greeting” and “GET /some/greeting/”: @RestController public class MyController { @GetMapping("/some/greeting") public String greeting() { return "Hello";
